name: uns(table)
description:
A day like any other. Every day is the same. The same cereal for years. The same procedure... 

You sit at the old table you inherited from your deceased father for your breakfast. The last thing which is left from him... Suddenly the table breaks and you fall. 

Now you can think of nothing but fixing this table that is so important to you. 

But it seems that a regret, which is still weighing on your heart, is mentally bothering you and affecting your view of the world. 

A mindbending game with jumping puzzles, a labyrinth and a cute puffer fish.

This game was created within the ludum dare 49  game jam.
